name: IMMUNE HERO
description:
Immune Hero is a unique game that pick concept of White Blood Cell which can destroy foreign matters in our body. Foreign matters are daisies, muchrooms, cheeses and soybeans that can make allergic symtom in someone. So, you have to destroy them by win this game.

As the player, you have to  collect all foreign matters before timeout. However,  if you touch bacteria or let them touch you,  You will lose.

Control

Control player by cliking on left mouse.

THANKS

3D Player:  https://www.mixamo.com/#

Player animation:  https://www.mixamo.com/#/

Sound & Sound effect:  epidemicsound or https://www.epidemicsound.com/referral/yh5u40/
